title: Welcome to Math Sprint 1.0
message:
Thank you for being part of our journey from alpha to the official launch! Math Sprint is now available to everyone worldwide.

**What's New**: We've introduced Daily Challenge - compete with players around the world on the same problems every day.

**Known Issue**: We are aware of a bug in tutorial step 8 where the "View All Achievements" button does not work. We're working on a fix.

Have feedback? [Share your thoughts with us](/feedback/) - we'd love to hear from you!

Happy sprinting!
